title: Atari example fails with an error
body:
Hi! I'm trying to run atari example just like in the manual and get the following error:

`CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="" catalyst-rl run-samplers --config=./config_dqn.yml
Process Process-1:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 297, in _bootstrap
    self.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 99, in run
    self._target(*self._args, **self._kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/catalyst/rl/scripts/run_samplers.py", line 94, in run_sampler
    sampler_id=id,
  File "/mnt/host_misc/catalyst/examples/atari/src/env.py", line 23, in __init__
    self.env = make_atari_env(**params)
TypeError: make_atari_env() got an unexpected keyword argument 'sampler_id'
Process Process-2:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 297, in _bootstrap

  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 99, in run

`

Can you tell me how to fix it?
